name: EPOS IMPACT 1060T Adaptive ANC Professional Office Wireless On Ear Headset
description: The EPOS IMPACT 1060T ANC is designed for professionals needing high-performance noise cancellation in open offices and remote work. Featuring hybrid adaptive ANC, this wireless headset with mic effectively blocks out background noise to help you stay focused. EPOS AI adaptive microphones ensure superior voice pickup, delivering crystal-clear calls on Microsoft Teams, Zoom, and Skype. With super wideband audio, this Bluetooth headset for work enhances natural speech clarity, making conversations more lifelike. Triple wireless connectivity lets you seamlessly switch between PC, laptop, smartphone, and tablet for uninterrupted workflows. Intuitive controls allow you to mute calls by moving the boom arm, while the included contactless charging stand keeps your headset powered at all times. Perfect for office professionals, call centers, and hybrid workers, the EPOS IMPACT 1060T ANC is a wireless PC headset for work, Windows, Mac, and mobile, offering advanced noise reduction and effortless communication.

name: Burnlab 6 in 1 multifunctional weight training kit
description:
About this item
Convertible features: The dumbbell can be converted into a barbell using the connecting bar and the push-up bars can be used to turn the dumbbell into a kettlebell. The weights adjust from 2 to 28 Kgs.
Long-lasting: The new and adjustable weight design from burnlab allows you to increase the weight over time without having to buy new weights.
New safety measures: Diamond knurled grip allows for a secure and non-slip grip, thickened nuts ensure that no weights fall and the anti-slip design prevents you from cutting your hands.
20MM foam barbell: Thickened foam in the barbell rod fits more comfortably on the neck and also helps in preventing any injuries.
Burnlab weights allow you to enjoy the benefits of a fully equipped gym without having to go to the gym! Rewrite the rules of fitness with Burnlab.
12kgs dumbbell set contains: 4 plates √ó 1.25kg = 5kg, 4 plates √ó 1.5kg = 6kg, & other accessories of 1kg. 28kgs dumbbell set contains: 4 plates √ó 1.25kg =5kg, 4 plates √ó 1.5kg = 6kg, 8 plates √ó 2kg = 16kg & other accessories of 1kg.
20kgs dumbbell set contains: 4 plates √ó 1.25kg =5kg, 4 plates √ó 1.5kg = 6kg, 4 plates √ó 2kg = 8kg & other accessories of 1kg

name: Flexnest Commercial Grade Adjustable And Foldable Gym Bench
description:
About this item
Heavy-Duty Construction: Built for durability and stability, this gym bench boasts a robust frame with a flat 250 kg weight capacity, ensuring safety and reliability during intense workouts. The premium leather upholstery adds comfort and luxury to your exercise experience.
Incline, Decline, and Flat Settings: The bench can be adjusted to various angles, allowing you to perform a wide range of exercises targeting different muscle groups. Whether you need an incline for shoulder presses or a decline for abdominal exercises, this bench accommodates your workout needs.
Space-Saving Storage: The bench features a foldable design that allows it to be compactly stored when not in use. This makes it ideal for home gyms with limited space, as it can be easily folded and tucked away.
Durable and Comfortable: The bench is upholstered in high-quality PU leather, offering both durability and comfort. This material is easy to clean and maintains its appearance over time, while also providing a cushioned surface for your workouts.
Enhanced Exercise Options: Included with the bench are resistance ropes, which can be used to add extra resistance to your exercises. These ropes are great for increasing the intensity of your workouts and can be used for strength training and stretching.
User-Friendly Setup: The bench comes with clear and straightforward assembly instructions, making it easy to set up and start using right away. This ensures that you can quickly get your home gym up and running with minimal hassle.

name: AS-IT-IS Nutrition ATOM Whey Protein 1kg | 27g
description:
About this item
BOOSTS YOUR PERFORMANCE TO NEXT LEVEL: When compared to others, Atom Whey protein has greater bioavailability, solubility and the highest PDCAA score of 1. The high-quality protein offers 27g protein per serving, 5.7g BCAA, 4.8g glutamine with minimal calories, fat and no sugar. Whether you engage in aerobic or resistance training, Whey protein supplementation helps you get the best out of every workout.
HIGH CONCENTRATION OF BCAA: The high concentration of BCAAs in Atom Whey Protein help promote anabolic response by maximizing muscle protein synthesis, helps preserve muscle glycogen stores, and minimize protein breakdown. BCAAs reduce the amount of tryptophan and the amount of serotonin produced, eventually allowing you to make more gains.
AUTHENTIC & QUALITY ASSURED: Atom Whey Protein is 100% authentic and goes through stringent analysis before it finally reaches the customers. It is manufactured at an FSSAI approved and GMP certified manufacturing plant. The supplement includes the best ever blend of Whey protein concentrate and Whey protein isolate to boost your power within and promote optimal gains. The product allows you to validate the authenticity before opening the seal.
IDEAL PROTEIN FOR EVERYONE: The 100% vegetarian, easy, & convenient AtomWhey protein supplement has an edge over other protein supplements in terms of fueling the muscle tissue. Whey serves as a mainstay protein not only for those interested in building muscle mass but also for those who turn to dietary protein to fill the protein gaps in a varied diet. The deliciously flavoured Whey fits all and comes with an enzyme blend to facilitate faster assimilation of Whey.
AMPS MUSCLE SYNTHESIS & MUSCLE RECOVERY: Strength training causes micro-tears in muscle fibres, which trigger inflammation and the body‚Äôs repair process. Whey digests faster than other forms of protein meaning that the body is able to receive the essential amino into the muscles at a faster rate, resulting in faster overall recovery. Consuming Whey within 30 minutes of exercise increases the body‚Äôs ability to stimulate protein synthesis & reduce muscle soreness.
